thread.title: Jake Gyllenhaal Praises Women After Marching with His Sister Maggie!
thread.title_full: Jake Gyllenhaal Praises Women After Marching with His Sister Maggie!

author: Just Jared
title: Jake Gyllenhaal Praises Women After Marching with His Sister Maggie!
text:
Jake Gyllenhaal is sending love and praise to women after he attended the 2017 Women’s March with his sister Maggie !
The 36-year-old actor wore buttons with powerful messages and he also held up a sign that said, “I make the best signs. They’re terrific. Everyone agrees.”
Jake took to his Facebook page the day after the march to talk about his experience.
“I was so proud to stand with the women, men and children at yesterday’s #WomensMarch on Washington. After months of fear and shame, the gathering was full of joy, defiance and hope. It was more clear than ever that women are the real stewards of our country’s soul, and I will continue to follow their lead and show up,” Jake said.
